org.apache.paimon.io

Class SingleFileWriter<T,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.io.SingleFileWriter<T,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of records to write.
    R - type of result to produce after writing a file.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, FileWriter<T,R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StatsCollectingSingleFileWriter

    public abstract class SingleFileWriter<T,R>
extends Object
implements FileWriter<T,R>
    A FileWriter to produce a single file.

      • write

        public void write(T record)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FileWriter
        Add only one record to this file writer.

        NOTE: If any exception occurs during writing, the writer should clean up useless files for the user.

        Specified by:
        write in interface FileWriter<T,R>
